languages.text: {n}Тяжело вздохнув и помолчав, Иеронимус глухо отвечает:{/n} "Это было сделано по моему приказу, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Всю жизнь я исповедовал заблудшие души — позволь же теперь исповедаться тебе. Я не ищу прощения или понимания, лишь хочу поведать истину. В эти криосклепы Аспис Бастаал-Чорда заточила своих наследников, чтобы они не посягнули на ее власть. Среди них была и Инцендия".

traits.locale_text: "Они сделали это по моему приказу, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Всю жизнь я исповедовал заблудшие души — позволь же теперь исповедоваться тебе. Я не ищу прощения или понимания, лишь хочу поведать тебе истину. Эти крио-склепы принадлежали династии Бастаал-Чорда. Вольный Торговец Аспис Бастаал-Чорда заточила в них всех своих наследников, чтобы ни один из них не мог посягнуть на ее власть. Среди них была и Инцендия".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus sighs heavily and is silent for a while, then he replies, in a hollow voice,{/n} "It was done on my orders. All my life, I have been a confessor to lost souls. Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжело вздохнув и помолчав, Иеронимус глухо отвечает:{/n} "Это было сделано по моему приказу, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Всю жизнь я исповедовал заблудшие души — позволь же теперь исповедаться тебе. Я не ищу прощения или понимания, лишь хочу поведать истину. В эти криосклепы Аспис Бастаал-Чорда заточила своих наследников, чтобы они не посягнули на ее власть. Среди них была и Инцендия".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus sighs heavily and is silent for a while. Then he replies, in a hollow voice,{/n} "It was done on my orders, my {mf|son|daughter}. All my life, I have been a confessor to lost souls. Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."

Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯重重地叹了口气，沉默片刻，随后用空洞的声音开了口。{/n}“是我命令他们那么做的。我这一生，都在听取那些迷失灵魂的忏悔。现在，请让我向你忏悔吧。我不寻求宽恕，也不寻求谅解，我只想说出真相。阿斯拜丝·巴斯塔·库尔达将她所有继承人囚禁在了冷冻舱里，以免这些人打算挑战她的权威。因森蒂娅也在其中。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus sighs heavily and is silent for a while, then he replies, in a hollow voice,{/n} "It was done on my orders. All my life, I have been a confessor to lost souls. Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯重重地叹了口气，沉默片刻，随后用空洞的声音开了口。{/n}“是我命令他们那么做的，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}。我这一生，都在听取那些迷失灵魂的忏悔。现在，请让我向你忏悔吧。我不寻求宽恕，也不寻求谅解，我只想说出真相。阿斯拜丝·巴斯塔·库尔达将她所有继承人囚禁在了冷冻舱里，以免这些人打算挑战她的权威。因森蒂娅也在其中。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは深いため息をついく。そして、落ち込んだ声で返事をした。{/n}「すべて私の命令で行われたのだ。私は生涯をかけて、ずっと迷える魂の告白を受けてきた。ここで一度、私自身の告白をさせてほしい。赦しや理解などは求めていない。ただ真実を語りたいだけだ。アスパイス・バスタール・チョーダは後継者を凍保管庫に閉じ込めた。権威に挑む者達を止めために。閉じ込められた中にはインセンディアも含まれていた」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus sighs heavily and is silent for a while, then he replies, in a hollow voice,{/n} "It was done on my orders. All my life, I have been a confessor to lost souls. Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは深いため息をついく。そして、落ち込んだ声で返事をした。{/n}「すべて私の命令で行われたのだ。私は生涯をかけて、ずっと迷える魂の告白を受けてきた。ここで一度、私自身の告白をさせてほしい。赦しや理解などは求めていない。ただ真実を語りたいだけだ。アスパイス・バスタール・チョーダは後継者を凍保管庫に閉じ込めた。権威に挑む者達を止めために。閉じ込められた中にはインセンディアも含まれていた」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus suspira y guarda silencio un rato. Luego responde, con voz hueca:{/n} «Se hizo bajo mis órdenes. He sido confesor de almas perdidas toda mi vida. Permítame ahora que le haga mi propia confesión. No busco perdón ni comprensión, solo quiero decir la verdad. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda había encarcelado a sus herederos en criocámaras para impedir que desafiaran su autoridad. Incendia estaba entre ellos».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus sighs heavily and is silent for a while, then he replies, in a hollow voice,{/n} "It was done on my orders. All my life, I have been a confessor to lost souls. Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus suspira y guarda silencio un rato. Luego responde, con voz hueca:{/n} «Se hizo bajo mis órdenes, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. He sido confesor de almas perdidas toda mi vida. Permítame ahora que le haga mi propia confesión. No busco perdón ni comprensión, solo quiero decir la verdad. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda había encarcelado a sus herederos en criocámaras para impedir que desafiaran su autoridad. Incendia estaba entre ellos».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus seufzt schwer und schweigt eine Weile. Dann antwortet er mit hohler Stimme:{/n} "Es ist auf meinen Befehl hin geschehen. Mein ganzes Leben lang war ich ein Beichtvater für verlorene Seelen. Nun lasst mich selbst beichten. Ich will weder Vergebung noch Verständnis. Ich will nur die Wahrheit sagen. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda hatte ihre Erben in Cryo-Gräbern eingesperrt, damit sie ihre Autorität nicht anzweifeln konnten. Incendia war auch unter ihnen."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus sighs heavily and is silent for a while, then he replies, in a hollow voice,{/n} "It was done on my orders. All my life, I have been a confessor to lost souls. Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus seufzt schwer und schweigt eine Weile. Dann antwortet er mit hohler Stimme:{/n} "Es ist auf meinen Befehl hin geschehen, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Mein ganzes Leben lang war ich ein Beichtvater für verlorene Seelen. Nun lasst mich selbst beichten. Ich will weder Vergebung noch Verständnis. Ich will nur die Wahrheit sagen. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda hatte ihre Erben in Cryo-Gräbern eingesperrt, damit sie ihre Autorität nicht anzweifeln konnten. Incendia war auch unter ihnen."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus pousse un long soupir et reste silencieux un instant, puis répond d'une voix caverneuse :{/n} « Ils ont agi sur mes ordres. Toute ma vie, j'ai confessé des âmes perdues, mais l'heure est venue pour moi de me confier à vous. Je ne cherche ni le pardon ni la compréhension ; non, tout ce que je veux, c'est dire la vérité. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda avait emprisonné ses héritiers dans ces chambres cryogéniques pour les empêcher de contester son autorité. Incendia était parmi eux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus sighs heavily and is silent for a while, then he replies, in a hollow voice,{/n} "It was done on my orders. All my life, I have been a confessor to lost souls. Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus pousse un long soupir et reste silencieux un instant, puis répond d'une voix caverneuse :{/n} « Ils ont agi sur mes ordres, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. Toute ma vie, j'ai confessé des âmes perdues, mais l'heure est venue pour moi de me confier à vous. Je ne cherche ni le pardon ni la compréhension ; non, tout ce que je veux, c'est dire la vérité. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda avait emprisonné ses héritiers dans ces chambres cryogéniques pour les empêcher de contester son autorité. Incendia était parmi eux. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus, derin bir iç çekip bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Ardından çökmüş bir sesle yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Tüm ömrüm boyunca kayıp ruhlar, günah çıkarmak için bana geldi. İzin ver şimdi de ben sana geleyim. Af veya anlayış beklemiyorum, gerçekleri söylemek istiyorum. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda, otoritesine meydan okumasınlar diye vârislerini kriyomahzenlere hapsetmişti. İncendia da aralarındaydı."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus sighs heavily and is silent for a while, then he replies, in a hollow voice,{/n} "It was done on my orders. All my life, I have been a confessor to lost souls. Now let me make my own confession to you. I seek no forgiveness or understanding; I only want to tell the truth. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda had imprisoned her heirs in those cryo-vaults, to stop them from challenging her authority. Incendia was among them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus derin bir iç çekiyor ve bir süre sessiz kalıyor. Ardından çökmüş bir sesle yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Benim emirlerime uyuyorlardı. Tüm ömrüm boyunca kayıp ruhlar beni günah çıkarmak için kullandı. Şimdi ise izin ver ben sana günah çıkarayım. Af veya anlayış beklemiyorum, tek istediğim gerçekleri söylemek. Aspyce Bastaal-Chorda, vârislerini, otoritesine meydan okumasınlar diye kriyomahzenlere hapsetmişti. İncendia da onların arasındaydı."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
